channel.title: Need help on skull text
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i151.photobucket.com/albums/s134/freekattack/skull.jpg[/img][/center]
How can i make it so it says "Danger" when you are in the wilderness and "Safe" when your in a safe zone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2008, 02:31:59 PM[/size][hr]Someone please help me.

item.title: Need help on skull text
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

is that “danger” written in yellow? cause if it is in client.java search for @yel@danger or @lre@danger you should find it.

Read full topic
